The Half Baked Sprout

  • About
  • Menu
  • Contact

Welcome to the half baked sprout, a restaurant dedicated to creating wonderful dishes and meals from humble vegetables.


Instead of taking meat dishes and trying to make them vegetarion, at the sprout we scour the world for authentic and truly delicious vegetarian dishes.


It may sound half baked, but you will be amazed at the flavour sensations that is possible, so come join us and open your pallette to the wonderful world of vegetables, pulses and legumes.


If you are feeling brave why not check out our signature desert, carmalised sprouts encased in choclate with a raspberry dippling coulis. You will either love it or hate it, but isn't that the case with sprouts? They are a firm favourite of ours and we hope they will become yours as well.
